abstract: A first look at Motorola’s newest Android-based smartphone.
snippet: A first look at Motorola’s newest Android-based smartphone.
lead_paragraph: I have not been drawn into any of the Android handsets I’ve tried so far. But the new Motorola Droid, introduced today for Verizon Wireless, is going to be fun to play with. It may not get me to get rid of my iPhone, but it’s clear already that it does have some features I envy.

headline.main: These May Be the Droids You’re Looking For
